actionCalls.name: myRule_1_A2
actionCalls.label: Assignment the Lead to the Partner

actionCalls.name: myRule_7_A2
actionCalls.label: Assignment the Lead to the Partner for Priority Leads

Flow.description: Add new logic: Person responsible name and email fields auto fill in

value.stringValue: AND( BEGINS([Lead].OwnerId, "005"), OR( AND( ISCHANGED([Lead].OwnerId), OR( PRIORVALUE([Lead].Owner:User.Email) = [Lead].Sales_Person_Responsible_Email_address__c, AND( [Lead].Sales_Person_Responsible_Email_address__c = '', [Lead].Sales_Person_Responsible_Name__c = '' ) ) ), AND( ISNEW(), [Lead].Sales_Person_Responsible_Email_address__c = '', [Lead].Sales_Person_Responsible_Name__c = '' ), AND( OR( ISCHANGED([Lead].Sales_Person_Responsible_Email_address__c), ISCHANGED([Lead].Sales_Person_Responsible_Name__c) ), [Lead].Sales_Person_Responsible_Email_address__c = '', [Lead].Sales_Person_Responsible_Name__c = '' ) ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_13
formulas.expression: AND( BEGINS({!myVariable_current.OwnerId}, "005"), OR( AND( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.OwnerId}), OR( PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.Owner:User.Email}) = {!myVariable_current.Sales_Person_Responsible_Email_address__c}, AND( {!myVariable_current.Sales_Person_Responsible_Email_address__c} = '', {!myVariable_current.Sales_Person_Responsible_Name__c} = '' ) ) ), AND( ISNEW(), {!myVariable_current.Sales_Person_Responsible_Email_address__c} = '', {!myVariable_current.Sales_Person_Responsible_Name__c} = '' ), AND( OR( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Sales_Person_Responsible_Email_address__c}), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Sales_Person_Responsible_Name__c}) ), {!myVariable_current.Sales_Person_Responsible_Email_address__c} = '', {!myVariable_current.Sales_Person_Responsible_Name__c} = '' ) ) )
